author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OUTER RAINBANDS OF ERIN STILL PRODUCING HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS ACROSS PUERTO RICO AND THE VIRGIN ISLANDS...
summary: ...OUTER RAINBANDS OF ERIN STILL PRODUCING HEAVY RAINS AND GUSTY WINDS ACROSS PUERTO RICO AND THE VIRGIN ISLANDS... As of 11:00 AM AST Sun Aug 17 the center of Erin was located near 21.0, -67.4 with movement WNW at 13 mph. The minimum central pressure was 946 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 125 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Erin (AT5/AL052025)
